title: Acoount Transfer
body:
Hey guys,

I'm here to know how i can transfer my NA account to EUW servers.
I know who normaly there is a thing in my account setting, in-game but in my in-game setting there is nothing except Change Name, so i don't know if that's because this is the pre-season or just a bug.

Thanks for reading and good game ;).

replies.body: When the servers transfers will be on ?

Transfers are on [cooldown ](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown)right now while we get ready for end of season reward distribution.  hang tight!
